[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Section” _builder_version=”4.0.6″ background_color=”#eeeeee” background_image=”https://www.himjobs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/bkgd-hrd-blue.jpg” global_module=”504″ saved_tabs=”all”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.0.6″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.0.6″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Candidates” _builder_version=”4.0.6″ text_font=”|300||on|||||” text_font_size=”40px” background_layout=”dark”]

Candidates

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.0.6″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.0.6″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.0.6″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.0.6″]

Why We Are The Best

Because we work very hard to be and you tell us so! Check out what other candidates think of the H.I.M. Recruiters experience on our testimonials page.

H.I.M. Recruiters specializes in recruitment within the Health Information Management profession, so we really have our finger on the pulse regarding exciting job opportunities that are perfect for you.

We are led by Perry Ellie who is a “Fellow” of American Health Information Management Association (AHIMA) and a Registered Health Information Administrator (RHIA) who has a solid reputation for quality, honesty and success. This expertise will be utilized completely in your career search. We have thousands of contacts in our database which allow us to network throughout the country on your behalf.

As professional recruiters, we are very concerned about the ethics of our business. There are too many recruiters out there that give the industry a bad name. We want to give you the opportunity to work with some truly great recruiters, who can add value to you as you seek to improve your career and quality of life.

We want to work with you, and we look forward to you telling us how we can help. Check us out with your professional peers and we believe you will find that our reputation is outstanding.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.0.6″ background_color=”#82be5a” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” global_module=”572″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.0.6″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.0.6″][et_pb_cta title=”Start Your Job Search” button_url=”https://www.himjobs.com/search-jobs/” button_text=”Search Jobs” _builder_version=”4.0.6″ background_enable_color=”off”]

View all of the HIM job opportunities available now.

[/et_pb_cta][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
